string-array.name: preference_gallery_slideshow_image_scaletype_entry_text
string-array.item: enlarge and crop to fit screen

string-array.name: top_tips
string-array.item: "If you have any issues with the app, please use email to notify me. If you wish, do post a negative review on Google Play, I'm not trying to stop that, but please email too. There is a link to send me an email at the top of the slide-out drawer menu. I can provide much more comprehensive support to an email address. Many thanks."

"You can only see files to select for upload that are acceptable to upload on your server. If you wish to upload videos, be sure to alter your server config.inc.php file to include $conf['upload_form_all_types'] = true; rather than false"
If an upload just won\'t succeed, try using the preference in the app settings upload page to clear any residual failed uploads from the server
Error always occurs when trying to update tags - \"You are not allowed to delete tags\" - Ensure users can both add and delete tags (server plugin setting)
Share files from a different app with this app to add them to the upload screen ready to go to your current server
Long click on an image (either thumbnail or slideshow item) that has failed to load in order to retrieve it again
Long click on an album to delete that album and all content
Long click on an album image to enable bulk selection of images for an action
When viewing any image in the slideshow, long click to rotate / change image size shown / allow further zooming
You can zoom into an image when viewing in a slideshow by drawing two fingers together or apart on the screen
When logged in as an administrator, before handing your device to a friend to view your photos, engage the application lock feature to prevent inadvertent changes being made to your gallery
Once you have viewed an entire video, if local file caching is enabled, it is possible to save that video to your downloads folder
Long click delete button on a \'file for upload\' to delete all files to be uploaded (when job is not in progress)
If images are slow to load, check that your server automatically generates the size used by this app when they are uploaded

string-array.name: release_history
string-array.item: "Bugfix: - Tidy up of a lot of issues causing crashes across the app following the last month of changes - Default setting for video compression corrected"

"Bugfix: - Potential for one resource to be missed from the album resource slideshow (full screen preview) - crash on preview of orphaned file Change: - preview of orphaned files and view within a slideshow if wished is now supported - orphans menu option is only available to admin users when app not readonly"

"Bugfix: - Hopefully the final bug where album thumbnails appeared not to be loading correctly Changes: - When deleting an album, child resources can be either unlinked, or deleted from the server - Paid Only: There is a new orphaned resource management page"

"Bugfix: - Rewrite of the album, tag, and favorite sorting code because it was riddled with bugs : If something in this area now doesn't work as you expect, please let me know. : This should solve crashes that were occurring on the slideshow page - The recently altered yellow star icon wasn't appearing in some sort orders - Correct the loading of thumbnails - Fix bug preventing manual reload of failed thumbnail load by clicking - just once so it isn't too iritating if you want to change album Changes: - New preference to allow independent sort order reversal of child albums and resources"

"Bugfix: - Problems caused in upload after re-working the file selection for keystore and certificates : Thanks for your patience, android file permissions management is tricky - delete of albums in root now always available on app load if appropriate - items can now be selected by clicking anywhere not just in the checkbox"

"Bugfix: - Keystore and Trusted certificate item editing caused crash. : Please email me from the app when key functionality like this doesn't work. - Sometimes unable to navigate out of recent files with system file selection - Groups list vertically aligned to the center of the screen Changes: - Better User experience for keystore and certificate import - New preference to control the length of time the image detail is shown in the fullscreen or slideshow view"

"Bugfix: - Recent changes made it impossible to have both the free and paid versions installed at the same time on a single device - album thumbnails not always showing for admin user - tested against Piwigo 11. Opening an image was not working"

"Bugfix: - More testing of the uploads area has removed a number of bugs including: - upload job can become stuck where shared files are no longer available - upload job can stop if the last updated date wasn't available for a video being compressed - Poor performance scrolling through albums - new image icon and media type icon disappear while scrolling through album - compressing a video to be just an audio file results was resulting in a video still - multimedia files will fail to play if the thumbnail is a default rather than file generated Changes: - Added option for server default sort order preference option - used when retrieving album content. This is now the default setting on app install."

"Bugfix: - wasn't taking Uri permissions for files shared by another app, causing upload failure on job restart - calculation of upload job completion status was too expensive for large jobs causing App to be non responsive"
"Bugfix: - Further improvements to file system permissions requests"
"Bugfix: - Last folder not default in folder select view - Releasing Uri permissions caused crash - Background upload job wasn't requesting the correct folder permissions"

"Bugfix: - UI appears unresponsive (white screen) after sharing a large number of files from external app - No files appear in the upload page after sharing them from another app - progress incorrectly reported while importing files for upload - performance of file import and removal of files from the upload list"

"Bugfix: - Insufficient file permissions used, causing failing uploads - Files downloaded not visible to other apps - download working for both default Downloads folder, and one selected by the user - App requested Read or Write File permissions when they weren't required. Changes: - New preference in app settings listing all Uri permissions held and their purpose - New DocumentProvider exposing files downloaded in the default download location to the system file selector. - No longer add files downloaded to the Android MediaStore - They're available in any File selector. - New menu link to open the downloaded files location Recommendation: - 1. Viewing all file permissions held by the app in the new preference, removing any you don't wish the app to hold. - 2. Check each of your background upload jobs, reselect the folder to upload - 3. Reselect the folder to download files from your server to"
"Bugfix: - Ensure the files selected in app for upload are processed on a background thread on sending to Upload page so the UI remains visible."
"Changes: - Update of the PiwigoClientWsExts plugin (Please update your server). This fixes the category names if you don't have ExtendedDescription plugin installed. - Added Dutch Translations"
"Bugfix: - Fixed code causing issues reloading classes from old versions"
"Bugfix: - Image compression format change caused crash during upload - File selection for upload issue"
"Bugfix: - Caches can become unreadable between versions unnecessarily"

"Bugfix: - Fixed a couple of issues causing crashes for some users Changes: - Added a UUID to logs and the about screen allowing me to track logs to specific user if they give me their UUID (for solving specific bugs they experience)."
"Bugfix: - Image compressor not working on recent versions of Android - Layout issues with bulk action buttons after long press in an album"
"Changes: - Support for Extended Description Plugin when latest PiwigoClientExt plugin version installed. Bugfix: - New code for Html style comments didn't support nulls - Sorry!"

"Change: - App Support added for the Extended Description Plugin (note: this plugin doesn't support the WS-API yet) - Much better handling of HTML style comments display - Scrolling for ultra long album descriptions - Max of 10 lines for sub-album descriptions"

"Change: - added translations for an error that can occur during video compression - Use Firebase App Installation GUID for message encryption where available Bugfix: - Corrected string translation for russian causing crash in slideshow"

"Change: - Removed the warning on screen rotate when mid way through a slideshow. Bugfix: - File download or share of resources can fail and then lock the feature until restart on Android 10+ - Corrected preferences appearing invisible in Android Dark mode (now usable) - fixed contrast issue on dialog popup in main app (Dark mode)"
"Bugfix: - Corrected button position in item actions bar when editing a resource item"
"Changes: - Switching an android file permissions grant to a subfolder is not permitted by android 30. (removing this feature). Bugfix: - Editing and saving automatic upload jobs not working"
